meanings.definition: The recorded ancestry or lineage of a person or animal.
meanings.sent1: The dog's pedigree showed it came from a long line of champions.
meanings.sent2: She proudly displayed the cat's pedigree, detailing its family tree.
meanings.sent3: The horse's pedigree was so impressive, it almost seemed like royalty.
meanings.sent4: His pedigree in the business world made him a sought-after mentor.
meanings.sent5: The ancient book held the pedigree of the mythical creatures.

meanings.definition: A document or chart showing the ancestry or lineage of a person or animal.
meanings.sent1: The pedigree of the thoroughbred horse was carefully documented.
meanings.sent2: The breeder presented the puppy's pedigree to the new owner.
meanings.sent3: The oversized pedigree chart covered the entire wall of the library.
meanings.sent4: The pedigree of the rare flower was like a map of its journey through time.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied the pedigree to understand the genetic history of the species.
